comment.author: 21686909@N07
comment._content: These photos are incredible.  What is more incredible is that women could not vote.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Another Bain/LOC photo of the indefatigable suffragist leader, "General" Rosalie Jones, on the march from NYC to Albany, New York [January 1, 1914]:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4690770664/in/photostream/]

More Bain/LOC photos from the NYC-Albany suffragists' march:
